summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation and special handling charges for various shipments. It includes payment details, adjustment requests, and service type information. The invoice highlights specific charges and the timeline of services rendered.

persons.name: Charles Miller
persons.context: Charles Miller is listed as the recipient for one of the shipments detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintern
persons.context: Lauren Kwintern is mentioned as the recipient for another shipment in the invoice.

persons.name: Gerald M Edelman
persons.context: Gerald M Edelman is identified as the recipient for a shipment related to the Neurosciences Research Foundation.

events.title: Pickup of Shipment
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Delivery Attempt
events.description: An attempt was made to deliver a shipment, but the recipient was not available.

events.title: Delivery of Shipment
events.description: A shipment was successfully delivered to Lauren Kwintern.

events.title: Delivery of Shipment
events.description: Another shipment was delivered to Lauren Kwintern.

keyFacts: The invoice details transportation charges totaling $22.85.
Multiple shipments were picked up and delivered between January 22 and January 25, 2002.
Charles Miller, Lauren Kwintern, and Gerald M Edelman are named recipients in the invoice.
The document includes a fuel surcharge applied to the shipments.
The payment for the invoice is due by February 16, 2002.
